column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Michael George Tolkien]]'''.<ref name=C>{{CG|C}}
problems with [[Tolkien fandom|fans]] and press.<ref name=C/>

column1: *'''Publication:''' [[Wayne G. Hammond|Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull|Scull]] published a description of the letter in their [[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology'']] (p. 759). Quotes from the letter have appeared in Michael Tolkien's transcript of his lecture delivered at the [[Wikipedia:University of St Andrews|University of St Andrews]] (section 26).<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Michael Tolkien (b. 1943)|Michael George Tolkien]]|articleurl=http://www.michaeltolkien.com/page74.html|articlename=Lecture on J.R.R.
